dc_title_s: Map of the City of New York
dc_description_s: Covers all of Manhattan, New York (N.Y.) south of 119th Street; also the westernmost parts of Queens and Brooklyn, New York (N.Y.) and part of Jersey City and Hoboken (N.J.) Shows existing and proposed streets, railroads, piers.  Date from previously assigned call number.  Relief shown by hachures.|47 x 84 centimeters|Scale not given.|City Maps
dc_publisher_s: City Director Office, 50 Greene St (New York)
